alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 10:21PM CST until March 05 at 10:48PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis affecting Clay, Greene and Dunklin Counties. For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several roads near Wilhelmina, Missouri are flooded. Recreational areas and large areas of agricultural land near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 22.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.4 feet on 01/14/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1030 AM CST.
